thread.title: RFAs requested to submit information on upcoming Regional, District elections
thread.title_full: RFAs requested to submit information on upcoming Regional, District elections

title: RFAs requested to submit information on upcoming Regional, District elections
text:
18:42 CET RFAs requested to submit information on upcoming Regional, District elections By Ghana FA 
The GFA Elections Committee has requested that all Regional Football Associations should submit the following information before Friday 30th October, 2015 to enable them conduct the various Regional and District elections. 
The Elections Committee of the GFA would need the following information to enable them conduct the above mentioned elections in the regions: 
i. List of Districts (Indicate Active and Inactive) 
ii. Delegate lists (DFAs, Second Division Clubs, 3rd & 4th Division Clubs, juvenile Football Clubs, Women Football Clubs, Referees and Coaches). 
iii. Proposed venue for each electionPlease note that per Article 7(2) of the GFA Elections Regulations, every member shall submit only ONE (1) delegate.
